### Make Some Vectors

```{r}
marmots <- c("blue", "green", 4, "yellow")

# Check Class
class(marmots)

```

```{r}
pika <- c(12.4, 6.8, 2.9, 8.8, 8.5)
class(pika)

##---# Scalar multiplier 

scalar_pika <- 5.2 * pika

scalar_pika

```

```{r}
bananas <- c(1, 2, 3)
apples <- c(6, 7, 8)

bananas + apples

bananas - apples

bananas %*% apples
```
